enabled.description: if this pattern should be used

super_expression.description: this regex pattern must match for this pattern to be used

expression.description: the regex pattern that must match, used for the replace properties

separator.description: the regex pattern used as a field separator

field.description: the field that expression should compare against. if it is null, all fields are matched with expression and all matching fields are replaced. if it is zero, the entire line is matched with expression and the match is replaced. if it is a positive number, only that field is matched with expression

min_fields.description: minimum fields the line must have

max_fields.description: maximum fields the line must have

replace.description: replace the span matched with expression with the given formatted string

replace_all.description: replace the entire line with the given formatted string

replace_groups.description: a list or object of strings that the match groups are replaced with

replace_fields.description: a list or object of strings that the fields are replaced with

filter.description: if true, do not output this line

stdout_only.description: only apply this pattern to stdout

stderr_only.description: only apply this pattern to stderr

skip_others.description: if this pattern is matched, do not match any others below it

activation_line.description: do not apply this pattern until linecount is at least this

deactivation_line.description: apply this pattern until linecount is at least this

activation_expression.description: do not apply this pattern until a line matching this regex pattern is found

deactivation_expression.description: apply this pattern until a line matching this regex pattern is found
